channel.title: Forum Help
channel.description:
I was wondering what I need to add to my sql to make subscriptions enabled because I press enable them under the administrative panel but it never saves it goes back to disabled right after. So maybe my subscriptions.php is messed up or maybe I need to add something to the sql which I dont know about. Please help me.
Also, I was wondering if anyone can help with the highscores.php because I am looking for one for a very long time and I cant find one without bugs and i dont know PHP.. i stick to java/C#/C++
